statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_id, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT city_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT city_id, congestion_level, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 'Low';
SELECT city_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE city_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, traffic_volume DESC
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 'High' AND date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT city_id, SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic FROM TrafficData GROUP BY city_id ORDER BY total_traffic DESC
SELECT city_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) AS average_traffic, congestion_level FROM TrafficData GROUP BY congestion_level HAVING average_traffic > 10000
SELECT * FROM Historical_Traffic_Data WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, traffic_volume FROM Historical_Traffic_Data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT city_name, date, traffic_volume FROM Historical_Traffic_Data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Urban_Development_Projects WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM Urban_Development_Projects WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Historical_Traffic_Data WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT city_name, SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic FROM Historical_Traffic_Data GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY total_traffic DESC;
SELECT city_name, date, traffic_volume FROM Historical_Traffic_Data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, completion_date FROM Urban_Development_Projects WHERE completion_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT city_name, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM Historical_Traffic_Data WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Data ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT ID, Location, Traffic_Volume FROM Traffic_Data WHERE Traffic_Volume > 1000
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE Incident_Type='Accident'
SELECT Incident_ID, Description FROM Traffic_Incidents ORDER BY Incident_Date ASC
SELECT Trend_ID, Season, Average_Speed FROM Traffic_Trends WHERE Year = 2022
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Data ORDER BY Date DESC, Time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT Incident_Type, Location, Description FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE Incident_Date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY Incident_Type ASC
SELECT Location, Traffic_Volume FROM Traffic_Data WHERE Traffic_Volume > 1000 ORDER BY Traffic_Volume DESC
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Trends WHERE Year = 2020 AND Season = 'Spring'
SELECT Incident_Type, Location FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE Location LIKE '%Highway%'
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Trends;
SELECT city_id, year, traffic_volume FROM Traffic_Trends ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT city_id, congestion_level FROM Traffic_Trends WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT planner_name, email FROM City_Planners WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM Traffic_Incidents ORDER BY incident_date;
SELECT city_id, year, traffic_volume FROM Traffic_Trends;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT planner_name, city_id FROM City_Planners ORDER BY planner_name DESC;
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM Road_Network WHERE city_id = 1 ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT city_id, AVG(traffic_volume) AS average_traffic FROM Traffic_Trends GROUP BY city_id;
SELECT id, location, status FROM Traffic_Lights;
SELECT location, status FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE status='Green';
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, location, sign_type FROM Traffic_Signs WHERE location='Main Street';
SELECT location, type FROM Traffic_Cameras WHERE type='Intersection';
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE status = 'green';
SELECT id, location, type FROM Traffic_Cameras WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT id, location, sign_type FROM Traffic_Signs ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, date, time, avg_speed FROM Traffic_Flow_Data WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC;
SELECT id, location, start_date, end_date FROM Road_Construction WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
